item.title: Setting Up Telegram Alerts for Prometheus - A Journey
item.description: Today I added something useful and long overdue to my homelab. My Spectrum router does not cover the whole house (it is not in the middle, but in a side room which is my home office), so I purchased an additional WiFi pod from Spectrum to create a mesh network. Unfortunately, the outlet where the pod is plugged in is a bit loose, so sometimes it disconnects and then Netflix starts to misbehave.
